io.micronaut.email.template

Interface TemplateBodyDecorator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EmailDecorator, io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTemplateBodyDecorator

    @DefaultImplementation(value=DefaultTemplateBodyDecorator.class)
public interface TemplateBodyDecorator
extends EmailDecorator
    Decorates emails whose text or html is of type TemplateBody by rendering those templates.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
